attributes.action: recommend a Knighthood for Bruce Forsyth entertainer,  for entertaining citizens of his country over many years
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: bruce forsyth has entertained millions of citizens at home and abroad and it's about time he was awarded a knighthood plain and simple. if stars absent from the uk can be offered and accept damehoods then bruce forsyth should be honoured with a knighthood that befits his time and service to crown and country

rejection.details: The Cabinet Office is actively seeking nominations for honours from the public. Please go to http://www.direct.gov.uk/honours
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
